response.overview: With Paramount, Belgian singer, writer and composer Ozark Henry embarks on his most ambitious project to date. Following an invitation by the National Orchestra of Belgium to pay tribute to his repertoire in a series of concerts, Henry decided to record an album with the 90-piece orchestra in stereo, 5.1 surround sound and 9.1 Auro-3D immersive sound, placing the audience in the creator's place. This makes him one of the first artists in the world to embrace 3D audio technology. Mastering engineer Darcy Proper could be looking at her 10th Grammy nomination (and fourth win) for her work on Paramount
response.title: Ozark Henry
